title: Not so finger lickin' good: Local competition, raw material costs hurt quick service
description: As consumer preference for lower-priced products and regional brands continues to rise, large quick-service restaurant chains in India are localising their menus. KFC India and Burger King have increased focus on lower-price points starting at Rs 99.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
